授業目的: This course introduces students to the basic study skills appropriate to a university student.
到達目標: By taking this course students will have the opportunity to learn the basic skills for studying at university.
授業方法: Face-to-face in-class lectures. Discussion, presentation, essay writing, mini lectures. Zoom lessons for students who have received permission to study online.

トピック.授業計画1: The course will be conducted as a seminar. Students will submit weekly essays on which class discussion will focus.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are to prepare weekly essays on specified readings. They are to also prepare to discuss the weekly readings more generally in class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading3:
備考　Note
Students will be graded based on 60% of the standard evaluation (assignment submissions in every class)

and 40% of the regular report (approximately 3000 characters).
As a general rule, the credits will not be granted to students who miss more than one-third of the class sessions.
